title.rendered: The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience, the United States Assistant Secretary of State for International Organization Affairs, Honourable Michele J. Sison and her team.

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience, the United States Assistant Secretary of State for International Organization Affairs, Honourable Michele J. Sison and her team today, 19th July, 2023.

The visiting US Assistant Secretary of State was in the Ministry to solicit Nigeria’s support for Professor Sarah H. Cleveland, United States Candidate for election to the ICJ (2024 – 2033), who was also on the delegation.
